attributes.action: Stop Illegal Forced Adoption! Justice For Broken Familys.
attributes.additional_details:
I, myself and thousands of other familys are torn apart by this evil system. 
vunerable parents are repeatidly told they are unfit to be parents, when its support we really need. this is child abuse
heres a link: https://m.youtube.com/watch?list=PLoZuRk7CqAQJCRj1VztRbK9hCifbNIxNh&v=NRWuQGV4lic
and another: https://m.youtube.com/watch?list=PLoZuRk7CqAQJCRj1VztRbK9hCifbNIxNh&params=OAFIAVgS&v=G8yrrBZn1D4&mode=NORMAL
attributes.background: social services string the same line yet secret family courts fail the truth. they take chidren/babys of innocent familys just to meet there adoption rates and get a massive pay rise and promotion even when parents have commited no crime.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104564

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
